DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , fixed sequence , two-period study assess effect multiple dose carbamazepine single dose pharmacokinetics RO4917838 . Subjects receive single oral dose RO4917838 Day 1 12-day study period 1 , washout 3-6 week , study period 2 carbamazepine orally daily Days 1-24 single oral dose RO4917838 Day 16 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study The Effect Multiple Dose Carbamazepine Single Dose Pharmacokinetics RO4917838 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy male volunteer , 1865 year age inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 1830 kg/m2 inclusive History presence disorder condition would render subject unsuitable study , place subject undue risk interfere ability subject complete study opinion investigator History significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , allergic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic psychiatric disease , cancer Any confirm significant allergic reaction drug , multiple allergy judgment investigator Native Asians subject Asian racial origin
